title: @Riot KateyKhaos , what's the likelihood of Super Galaxy Elise getting tweaked?
body:
I really like this skin for the most part, but one thing that kinda sticks out to me is how Elise' ponytail remains static. I was hoping her longer hair would move around dynamically like most other champions with ponytails.

I know it's a little late and everyone is already talking about the _newer_ skins on the PBE, but I'd rather let my voice be heard at all rather than never ._.

replies.body:
Those skins are being released today (most likely.)

So they are already on live.

So the chance of them being changed is nil.
Skins still get tweaked post release ie Arcade Corki, Pentakill Morde/Sona
Yeah, but those were months or years after their initial release. It sounds like you want the edits sooner rather than later.

Hey Bladerunner7777! 

With these skins on live, we're no longer accepting feedback/making changes on these skins, unless there is an issue with gameplay specifically.

Would it be possible for you to take a look at Super Galaxy Annie's Molten shield (E) Activation's VFX against Banshee's Veil's active spell shield?

They look very similar in size and color and somewhat hard to tell when she is using what.

Maybe just my potatoe, I'm playing on low settings and can't see the details if there is a flame.

> [{quoted}](name=Kei143,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=uvoAXGGz,comment-id=00010002,timestamp=2017-10-21T02:51:02.461+0000)
>
> Would it be possible for you to take a look at Super Galaxy Annie's Molten shield (E) Activation's VFX against Banshee's Veil's active spell shield?
> 
> They look very similar in size and color and somewhat hard to tell when she is using what.
> 
> Maybe just my potatoe, I'm playing on low settings and can't see the details if there is a flame.

Hiya Kei143!

I wanted to catch up with ya, since I never got to respond. I looked through this scenario with the VFX artist, and unfortunately, there isn't an elegant way to solve this without drastically changing the Molten Shield (E) VFX. We actually got this feedback before and made changes to separate the Molten Shield particles from Banshee's Veil, Sivir's Spell Shield, and Edge of Night (mainly by adding more details and graphics to the shield), so thanks for bringing this up. It shows that we didn't separate the particles far enough and need to index harder on this in the future.

We don't want to change up the shield too much since many players like its current iteration, but do you have any suggestions on how to improve the readability here? :] Help would be wonderful!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot LoveStrut,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=uvoAXGGz,comment-id=000100020001,timestamp=2017-10-30T22:03:20.585+0000)
>
> We don't want to change up the shield too much since many players like its current iteration, but do you have any suggestions on how to improve the readability here? :] Help would be wonderful!

Personally I think a color tweak would be good enough, like adding a hint of purple or red (like her armor or her hair). Changing the VFX's shape is another option, but I think that takes too much bandwidth to do.

EDIT: wait, there is a hint of purple on it already. Maybe it;s just my potatoe not showing it :( I might get used to it after seeing it in a few more games.

EDIT2: Maybe try reversing the blue and purple colors? That might make it look less like the banshees cos the colors are different but would still give off the blue flame feel?
Hi hi! Sure thing - I'll sync with Riot Love Strut who's our QA friend on that skin. :)

Hi Katey, are you still on the skins team? 

If you have a minute, I'd love your thoughts on this thread I made. Its a year old, but i think its still relatable. 

Cheers have a great day
